mads.note: Liber bene dictorum, frr. duo [CF] 1991: PHI CD ROM #5.3, Latin Canon, bibliographic screen (A. Cascellius)

Pauly-Wissowa: 6. Halbbd., col. 1694-1637; "Cascellius", #4 (A. Cascellius A.F. Rom(ilia tribu), roman jurist, b. possibly around 104 B.C., Questor, 75 and 73 B.C., mentioned by Macrobius, 56 B.C., mentioned in Horace's Ars poetica, which would make Cascellius 80-90 years old at his death)
Dict. of Greek and Roman biog. and mythology, 1967: v. 1, p. 618-619 (A. Cascellius; eminent Roman jurist, contemporary with Trebatius)
